mapper.select: SELECT tenant.code AS TenantRowId, tenant.Name as Tenantcode,servergroup.ServerGroupName as GroupCode, qsserver.ServerIP as Ip,qsserver.ServerPort as Port FROM tenant LEFT JOIN servergroup ON servergroup.RowId=tenant.ServerGroupRowId LEFT JOIN qsserver ON qsserver.ServerGroupRowId=servergroup.RowId WHERE tenant.Name=#{Tenantcode}
